shapes.label: Project
shapes.comment: An enterprise (potentially individual but typically collaborative), planned to achieve a particular aim. Use properties from [[Organization]], [[subOrganization]]/[[parentOrganization]] to indicate project sub-structures.

property.name: startDate
property.description: The start date and time of the item (in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601)).

property.name: endDate
property.description: The end date and time of the item (in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601)).
